name: LSP Reloader
description: A Replit extension that can reload LSPs when they die, so that you don't have to reboot the Repl all the time.
longDescription:
A Replit extension that can reload LSPs when they die, so that you don't have to reboot the Repl all the time.

Thanks @IroncladDev for the idea.

scopes.name: read
scopes.reason: Read your .replit file to detect configured LSPs.

scopes.name: write-exec
scopes.reason: Execute code to kill the LSPs.
